name: Want to walk on Lisbon like a local? Just need 2 hours to learn it!
description: Lisbon is a beautiful city full of special and unknown places to most of the visitors. I can show the places where local go to a walk on a Sunday afternoon and during the week, where we like to go to eat, take a walk with the family or simply have the traditional "Café e uma nata!" or in english " a coffee and a custard cream tart.
